metadata.creator: Presidential Communications Development and Strategic Planning Office
metadata.description:
The Philippine Electoral Almanac is a compendium and handy resource of Philippine national elections from 1935 onwards that explores the political relationships between the Presidency, the Legislature, and the Filipino electorate. The graphs, charts, and election results this almanac contains collectively represent the first effort to publish, in an accessible form and language, a history of the Philippine electoral process.
Number of pages:
Please use the citation below: Presidential Communications Development and Strategic Planning Office. (2012). Philippine Electoral Almanac 1st Editon. Retrieved from https://archive.org/details/ThePhilippineElectoralAlmanac1stEdition
metadata.subject: Electoral Almanac
metadata.title: The Philippine Electoral Almanac 1st Edition
